verbose_text: Studies on the M 2 -muscarinic receptors and beta 2 ARs have demonstrated that at least in some cases the dependence on phosphorylation for recruitment of arrestin to GPCRs is not equal as a phosphorylation deficient M 2 -muscarininc receptor interacts with arrestin normally, whereas arrestin recruitment to a phosphorylation deficient beta 2 AR was substantially reduced [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: arrestin recruitment to a phosphorylation-deficient beta 2 AR
